name: Interact Club
description: A service organization sponsored by the Rotary Club. Members participate in community service projects such as food drives and the Clemson Christmas Parade.
student_leaders: Caton Tsao, Lilly Tidwell, Lizah Williams, Laurel Garst, Bailey Choi

name: Beta Club
description: National organization promoting the ideals of academic achievement, character, service, and leadership.

name: Science National Honor Society (SNHS)
description: Honor society for students excelling in science. Members participate in the regional science fair and research symposiums.
student_leaders: Kaya Gedikoglu, Davis Reeves, Harper Warwick, Julianna Tang, Tinisha Singh

name: Research Club
description: A club dedicated to conducting and presenting original student research in preparation for competitions like ISEF.
student_leaders: Arjun Jain, Julianna Tang, Tinisha Singh

name: Academic Team
description: A competitive team that tests knowledge across various subjects including history, science, literature, and math in a buzzer-style format.

name: Student Council
description: Student government body responsible for organizing school-wide events, spirit weeks, and representing student interests.

name: Link Crew
description: A high school transition program where upperclassmen mentor freshmen to ensure a smooth start to high school.

name: DECA
description: Prepares emerging leaders and entrepreneurs in marketing, finance, hospitality, and management.

name: Air Force JROTC
description: Curriculum focuses on leadership, aerospace science, and community service through the cadet corps.

name: Drama / Theatre
description: Produces school plays and musicals, offering opportunities for both performance and technical stage crew.

name: HOSA
description: Future Health Professionals organization focused on developing leadership and technical skills for healthcare careers.

name: AI and Machine Learning Club
description: Explores the fundamentals of artificial intelligence, neural networks, and technology ethics.

name: Math Club
description: A group for students who enjoy mathematical problem solving and preparing for regional competitions.

name: Girls in STEM Club
description: Empowers female-identifying students to explore careers and activities in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

name: RiSE Environmental Club
description: Focuses on environmental sustainability, school recycling efforts, and promoting green initiatives.

name: Clash Royale Club
description: A social club centered around competitive and casual play of the mobile game Clash Royale.

name: Cubing Club
description: Dedicated to the art of speed-solving Rubik's cubes and other twisty puzzles.

name: E-Sports Club
description: Competitive gaming organization where students compete in various titles against other schools.

name: Coding Club
description: A collaborative environment for students to learn programming languages and work on software projects.

name: Chess Club
description: A place for players of all skill levels to play, study strategies, and compete in tournaments. A very successful team that has competed at state and had a 14-year winstreak.

name: Table Tennis Club
description: Provides students a space to practice and compete in table tennis in a fun, high-energy environment.

name: Badminton Club
description: A recreational club where students can learn the fundamentals of badminton and participate in matches.

name: Photography Club
description: Explores the artistic and technical sides of photography, including composition and digital editing.

name: Speech and Debate Club
description: Develops public speaking and critical thinking skills through structured debate competitions.

name: Model UN
description: Simulates United Nations conferences, allowing students to solve global issues through diplomacy.

name: Mock Trial
description: Students act as attorneys and witnesses in a simulated courtroom environment competing against other schools.

name: Psychology Club
description: Explores human behavior, mental processes, and famous studies through discussions and activities.

name: Book Club (Douglass)
description: A social reading club that meets to discuss selected literature and share a love for reading.
student_leaders: Sarah Smith, Keira Kerscher, Charlie Perry

name: F-1 Club
description: Dedicated to the fans of Formula 1 racing, discussing race results and engineering.

name: Fellowship of Christian Athletes (FCA)
description: A student-led group that provides fellowship and encouragement through a shared interest in athletics.

name: RPG Club
description: A club for tabletop role-playing games like Dungeons & Dragons, focusing on storytelling, teamwork, and creative strategy.

name: Youth Commission International (YCI)
description: A student-led Christian organization focused on providing a space for students to meet, pray, and discuss faith-based topics.
student_leaders: Vannessa Miller, Preston Falkner, Keira Kerscher

name: Manestage Players
description: A student theatre group dedicated to performing and promoting the dramatic arts within the school community.

name: International Thespian Society
description: An honor society for high school theatre students that recognizes excellence in dramatic arts and technical theatre.

name: Gardening Club
description: Focuses on cultivating school gardens, learning about plant biology, and promoting sustainable agriculture practices.
